channel.title: How to fix the js5connect PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
hey there,
i would like to know how to fix the js5connect its so annyoing that i was about to delete the entire source -.- so please reply a good answer and if you wondering what is js5connect it is when server/client crashes but some of them works fine but still crashes post a helpful reply please and i will be thanking the person from my heart,thanks
-jack

item.title: How to fix the js5connect PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:4, topic:533522”]js5connect = can’t recognize the no-ip used

set the client to 127.0.0.1 or if you have the client set to your own no-ip then you probably didn’t portforward right[/quote]and if that doesnt work^ try portforwarding and get a no-ip and see if that will work.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix the js5connect PLEASE HELP

item.title: How to fix the js5connect PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

js5connect = can’t recognize the no-ip used

set the client to 127.0.0.1 or if you have the client set to your own no-ip then you probably didn’t portforward right

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix the js5connect PLEASE HELP

item.title: How to fix the js5connect PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Docent:

I believe that the js5connect error is because the server is not online BEFORE the client is ran.

This.
The client must connect to the server on start up.
So if your client doesn’t see the server. It’s either you didn’t turn it on first, or you have bad networking (Ex: portforwarding issues)

Read full topic
